projects.title: CFC Event Manager
projects.desc:
Developed a fullstack internal dashboard using React, Node.js, TailwindCSS, and C#/.NET, seamlessly integrating frontend and backend systems to provide near real-time monitoring and management of 10K+ daily business events across 100+ operational processes, significantly reducing manual intervention.
Led the design of high-fidelity Figma mockups for multiple end-to-end workflows, shaping the frontend using an iterative methodology to ensure user-centric, intuitive experiences, streamlining engineering handoff and reducing frontend implementation time by 15%.

projects.title: Samoth
projects.desc: Designed and developed a portfolio site for Samoth, providing an interactive gallery to experience Samothâ€™s various visual project deliverables, garnering roughly 500 active users in one year.

projects.title: Finder
projects.desc: Engineered Finder, a lost-and-found web application for RPI, collaborating with 4 peers to implement secure user authentication, automated item-matching algorithms, and a responsive UI to be utilized by 9,000+ students, faculty, and staff.

projects.title: Berle Farm
projects.desc: Conducted an end-to-end UI/UX study of Berle Farm's e-commerce site, delivering a 16-page analysis, dynamic Figma mockups, and a 20-minute mock presentation to stakeholders.

projects.title: HACKRPI X
projects.desc: Designed and developed components of the HACKRPI 2023 (HACKRPI X) web application as Team Lead of the Rensselaer Center for Open Source HACKRPI Website Development Team.
